title: Lightning Strikes
description:
Jenna Khalo, J Carpenter, Amber Rollo, and Jack Perry share stories about infidelity, natural disasters, standing up to creeps and finding work you love.

Support RISK! on Patreon at Patreon.com/RISK

author: Kevin@RISK-show.com (Kamasi Washington, Jenna Khalo, Amber Rollo, Jack Perry, Shawn Colvin, The Flaming Lips, Kevin Allison, J Carpenter)
